translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: who amasses wealth ˹greedily˺ and counts it ˹repeatedly˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: thinking that their wealth will make them immortal!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Not at all! Such a person will certainly be tossed into the Crusher.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: And what will make you realize what the Crusher is?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: It will be sealed over them,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
